articles.title: Nintendo Switch "Successor" Announcement Is Coming "This Fiscal Year" - Nintendo Life
articles.description: A Nintendo Direct in June will focus on the current Switch only
articles.content:
Image: Nintendo
The next Nintendo console will be announced "within this fiscal year," according to Nintendo president Shuntaro Furukawa.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: US, UK, most EU nations to boycott Putin inauguration - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Russia’s Vladimir Putin will be sworn in for a fifth term as president in a ceremony at the Kremlin later on Tuesday.
articles.content:
The United States and most European Union nations have said they will not send envoys to Tuesdays inauguration of Vladimir Putin as Russian president.
Putin, 71, secured a fifth term in office in a … [+3810 chars]
